title: Rahu Transit in the 7th House for Gemini Ascendant
summary: Rahu transiting the seventh house intensifies focus on partnerships, contracts, and public dealings. Attraction toward unconventional people or alliances increases, bringing sudden beginnings and tests of trust. Business partnerships can expand reach quickly, but clarity and boundaries are essential to avoid misunderstandings. Conscious balance between self-interest and cooperation keeps outcomes stable.

sections.heading: Relationships
points: Sudden starts or shifts in bonds

sections.heading: Mental / Inner State
points: Desire to be seen and chosen

closing: This transit reshapes partnerships through experimentation. Clarity and boundaries turn attraction into durable collaboration.
